articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Mikaela Shiffrin surges into history with record-tying 86th World Cup win - The Guardian
articles.description: Mikaela Shiffrin surged into history on Friday, winning a giant slalom in Are, Sweden, for her record-tying 86th win on the World Cup skiing circuit
articles.content:
American skier Mikaela Shiffrin won her record-tying 86th World Cup race Friday with victory in a giant slalom.
Shiffrins win matched the overall record set by Swedish great Ingemar Stenmark 34 year… [+2200 chars]

articles.title: Marcus Rashford reveals Manchester United dressing room target after Liverpool FC response - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Man United responded to the Anfield defeat in the best possible fashion with a dominant 4-1 win against Real Betis on Thursday.
articles.content:
Marcus Rashford wants Manchester United to regain their momentum after they suffered a huge setback against Liverpool.
